sentences.sContent: This pesticide is diluted with water and applied directly to the fields.
sentences.sContent_eng: This pesticide is diluted with water and applied directly to the fields.
sentences.sCn: 这种杀虫剂用水稀释后直接施用在田里。

remMethod.val: pest(瘟疫) + i + cide(杀) → 杀害虫的东西 → 杀虫剂

trans.tranOther: a chemical substance used to kill insects and small animals that destroy crops
